alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 14 at 4:00PM MDT until September 14 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sedgwick County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 400 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Ovid, or 7 miles south of Chappell, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sedgwick County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
